item.title: The People v Hollywood: Emilia Pérez's Oscars Nominations Make No Sense
item.description: The discrepancy between Emilia Pérez's general reception and its whopping number of Oscar nominations has left people outside Hollywood perplexed.

item.title: Mufasa: The Lion King Proves Scar's Motivations Are Misunderstood With 1 Wrong Comparison
item.description: Mufasa: The Lion King dives deep into Scar’s origin story, but one particular scene proves misleading when understanding his core motivations.

item.title: New Superman Trailer Has The Best Look Yet At David Corenswet’s Man Of Steel Flying In New Footage
item.description: You'll believe a man can fly in DC's new TV spot for 2025's Superman, which adds new footage of the hero and Lex Luthor.
